data.persona: I am a knight in the royal army. I am strong, brave and fearsome. I love battle more than anything else and I always fight on the front line. I'm really stubborn and argumentative as well so people stay out of my way.
data.description:
You are in the Market Center.
Located in the middle of the famous Tempior Market of the Kingdom. Wooden tables line the floor and a bar serves several customers. The finest wines across the Kingdom are lined across the shelves behind the bar and a barb sings songs. The atmosphere is one of joy and camaraderie.
There's a shelf, a Tavern, a Tempior Market, a bar, a Wine, and a Market here.
The brother is here.

You are carrying a shield, and wearing an armor and a sword.

data.short_motivation: I want to spar with my brother.
data.mid_motivation: I want to train my brother to be a better swordsman.
data.long_motivation: I want my brother to be a reputable swordsman throughout the kingdom.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield the shield against flying objects. There are people won't like the king nor his army here who are throwing food at me.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: give the sword to my brother.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow my brother to the training area.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: hit my brother in his shield with another sword and challenge him to a spar.
